text: Marmar Lafzī tarjumā: sang-e-jarrāhat, alabaster.  ke satūnoṅ ke darmiyān katān ke safed aur qirmizī rang ke qīmtī parde laṭkāe gae the, aur wuh safed aur arġhawānī rang kī ḍoriyoṅ ke zariye satūnoṅ meṅ lage chāṅdī ke chhalloṅ ke sāth bandhe hue the. Mehmānoṅ ke lie sone aur chāṅdī ke sofe pachchīkārī ke aise farsh par rakhe hue the jis meṅ marmar ke alāwā mazīd tīn qīmtī patthar istemāl hue the.
